title: I cannot login from the client
body: I can login here but I cannot login the game!!! I need help! It says my account or passward is incorrect.

replies.body:
Weeeeeeiiiiiiiird......we did have some issues with our login servers the other day, but those have all been cleared up at this point. First I want to make sure that you have the right region selected when you're trying to login, I know it sounds dumb but let's double check juuuuuuust in case!

If that's not the problem, let's go ahead and take a look at some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), paying close attention to the firewall section. Hit me back up if you're still having problems signing in after that though!
